actions.text: Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. DeLay to the Shays amendment (A002).
On agreeing to the DeLay amendment (A012) Agreed to by recorded vote: 360 - 36 (Roll No. 304).

description: Amendment expresses as the sense of Congress that Federal law clearly demonstrates that "controlling legal authority" prohibits the use of Federal property to raise campaign funds.
purpose: An amendment to express the Sense of Congress that Federal law clearly demonstrates that "controlling legal authority" prohibits the use of Federal property to raise campaign funds.
